biotools.summary: MRanalysis is a comprehensive and user-friendly, web-based platform that provides the first integrated and standardized Mendelian randomization (MR) analysis workflow. This includes GWAS data quality assessment, power/ sample size estimation, MR analysis, SNP-to-gene enrichment analysis, and data visualization. Built using the R shiny framework, MRanalysis enables users to conduct common MR methods, including univariable, multivariable, and mediation MR analyses through an intuitive, no-code interface .
